column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''49''' is the forty-ninth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Eldarin Hands, Fingers & Numerals and Related Writings" — Part Three — [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] ; edited by [[Patrick H. Wynne]]
** '''The above article contains previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
* "Five Late Quenya Volitive Inscriptions" — [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] ; edited by Carl F. Hostetter
** '''The above article contains previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
*[http://www.tolkienindex.net/index/Category:Vinyar_Tengwar_49_Index Online index of names for ''Vinyar Tengwar'' 49]
